Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a simple, solid rectangle. This class represents a Rectabgle object. When combined with the GameArena class, instances of the Rectangle class can be displayed on the screen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double w,
                 double h,
                 java.lang.String col,
                 double xInc,
                 double yInc)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        x - position of Rectangle on x-axis
        y - position of Rectangle on y-axis
        w - width of Rectangle
        h - height of Rectangle
        col - colour of Rectangle
        xInc - movement of Rectangle along x-axis
        yInc - movement of Rectangle along y-axis
